name: ext_R4_MedicinalProductManufactured
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductManufactured for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductManufactured from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductManufactured|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: The manufactured item as contained in the packaged medicinal product
element.definition: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: xml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element.
